TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. you're a saint and can have no fun.

I wish for POLITICS

Granted. You get many (poly) small blood-sucking insects (ticks).

I wish for a nap

Granted. it's in a pile of Weta.

I wish i wasn't about to be slapped.

Granted. You're about to be PUNCHED.

I wish I could sleep tonight, no thanks to Rage there...

Granted, but you dream of equally disturbing things that must not be named.

I wish that I didn't have a headache.

I wish that I didn't have a headache.

Granted, it is hidden by terrible stomachache.

I wish for steady and legal income of money, without much work. Just enough to have comfortable life.

Granted, the money will spawn within your liver. IÃ‚Â´m sorry to say thatÃ‚Â´s a helluva way to die....

I wish I had proper drawing skills.

Granted, you can only draw lines, but good lines.

I wish my rover wouldn't break apart from my rocket on launch.

Granted. It breaks apart after launch.

I wish docking wasn't so darn hard.

Granted, its impossible.

I wish for people to post more in the games forum.

I wish for people to post more in the games forum.

Granted: people post so much that they crash servers. Constantly...

I wish for a big jug of tasty, fresh orange juice. Without causing me to die...

Granted. It smells really bad.

I wish for a dolphin

Granted, it kills you.

I wish for Rage to come to the IRC chat.

Granted, but he quickly dies after being horribly teleported to the Inside a Roller Coaster chat along with everyone else in there.

I wish that it was opposite day.

Not Granted. Your wish isn't granted because it's opposite day.

I wish I'd always remember to make a wish.

Granted, but you forget who your family is.

I wish for a tall glass of root beer.

You get american light beer instead

I wish for a tasty pizza

granted but it viciously murders you from the inside

I wish I had a tardis

Granted, then it traps you inside and suffocates you.

I wish i had better skills at this game.

Granted. You become so excellent at the game that your become hired as first a Moderator here, and then a Dev at squad. However, you accidentally release the Kraken and bring misery to KSP. You are instantly kicked out onto the street by SQUAD.

I wish for pie.

Granted. But now you can't have any of the snickerdoodles I just baked.

I wish for more cookies

Granted. they contain crushed insects and sour milk.

I wish for IRC RAAWWERR

You do have it. But it breaks again

I wish for snickerdoodles

Granted, they are all inside me now

I wish for the IRC to work

Granted. But it breaks again before anyone but you signs on.

I wish my hands always smelt like vanilla and cinnamon
